p: The trends in precipitation, evapotranspiration and streamflow at the Alar station during 1960~2015 are shown in Fig. 1. Precipitation shows a slight upward trend with a slope of 0.61 mm/year over a period of 1960 to 2015 (R 2 = 0.10). Potential evapotranspiration shows a significant decreasing trend with a slope of −2.99 mm/year (R 2 = 0.41). Similarly, streamflow shows a slight decreasing trend with a slope of −0.15 mm/year (R 2 = 0.08).
